page.title: 11OLD HOUSES
page.content: Huntly'S old houses are in Old Road. These houses have about 2 houses to every block. The roofs of the houses are made of slate and the walls are made of sandstone.The windows and doors are made of wood and one block of houses has 12 chimneys and there are 2 windows upstairs and 2 windows downstairs. We interveiwed in Beldies shop. The shop is over a hundred years old and is made from lime stone.The owner of the shop has lived in the house for 38 years.He likes living in the house because it is the way he makes a living, it has walls two and a half feet thick so it is very warm.It has a celler which is very cold.The shop has been a shop for 32 years and the size of the house is 5 roomed.
